title: Single Of The Week: Messy Sparkles – Thank God
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/messysparkles.jpg "messysparkles")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/7053-single-of-the-week-messy-sparkles-thank-god/attachment/messysparkles) It’s 2am, I can’t sleep and tomorrow I start a ‘grim as fuck’ sales job so I can pay rent until I start art school again in September. But things aren’t so bad because I put this tune on. Like I said it’s 2am so I’ll keep this short; check out and download the song below. Thank God by Messy Sparkles
